iphone12.name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
iphone12.notes: Device is in excellent condition with minimal signs of use. All functions work perfectly. Has been in a case since purchase.

samsungS21.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
samsungS21.notes: Device has some minor wear on the corners but is fully functional. Screen has a screen protector applied.

macbookPro.name: MacBook Pro 2019
macbookPro.notes: Device has some keyboard wear and a small dent on the bottom case. Battery health is good. All ports functioning properly.
